00031 /*
00032 ** This is where platform-specific changes need to be made.
00033 */
00034 #if defined(WIN32) || defined(_WIN32) || defined(__WIN32__)
00035 #include <windows.h>
00036 #define tds_sysdep_int16_type short     /* 16-bit int */
00037 #define tds_sysdep_int32_type int       /* 32-bit int */
00038 #define tds_sysdep_int64_type __int64   /* 64-bit int */
00039 #define tds_sysdep_real32_type float    /* 32-bit real */
00040 #define tds_sysdep_real64_type double   /* 64-bit real */
00041 #define tds_sysdep_intptr_type int      /* 32-bit int */
00042 #endif                          /* defined(WIN32) || defined(_WIN32) || defined(__WIN32__) */
00043 
00044 #ifndef tds_sysdep_int16_type
00045 #define tds_sysdep_int16_type short     /* 16-bit int */
00046 #endif                          /* !tds_sysdep_int16_type */
00047 
00048 #ifndef tds_sysdep_int32_type
00049 #define tds_sysdep_int32_type int       /* 32-bit int */
00050 #endif                          /* !tds_sysdep_int32_type */
00051 
00052 #ifndef tds_sysdep_int64_type
00053 #define tds_sysdep_int64_type long long /* 64-bit int */
00054 #endif                          /* !tds_sysdep_int64_type */
00055 
00056 #ifndef tds_sysdep_real32_type
00057 #define tds_sysdep_real32_type float    /* 32-bit real */
00058 #endif                          /* !tds_sysdep_real32_type */
00059 
00060 #ifndef tds_sysdep_real64_type
00061 #define tds_sysdep_real64_type double   /* 64-bit real */
00062 #endif                          /* !tds_sysdep_real64_type */
00063 
00064 #ifndef tds_sysdep_intptr_type
00065 #define tds_sysdep_intptr_type int
00066 #endif                          /* !tds_sysdep_intptr_type */
00067 
00068 #if !defined(__WIN32__) && !defined(_WIN32) && !defined(WIN32)
00069 typedef int TDS_SYS_SOCKET;
00070 #define INVALID_SOCKET -1
00071 #define TDS_IS_SOCKET_INVALID(s) ((s) < 0)
00072 #else
00073 typedef SOCKET TDS_SYS_SOCKET;
00074 #define TDS_IS_SOCKET_INVALID(s) ((s) == INVALID_SOCKET)
00075 #endif
00076

00078 }
